channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Blink Arc Can Merge Two Security Cameras for a 180-Degree View
item.description: Amazon-owned Blink debuted new cameras with 2K resolution and an accessory that enables a wider field of view.

item.title: Subaru Crosstrek Hybrid 2026 Review: Smooth, Efficient
item.description: Finally a proper hybrid, the Crosstrek has a near 600-miles range and full mechanical all-wheel drive. And, for the first time ever, a heated steering...

item.title: Save up to 20% on TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 Community Passes — offer ends October 3
item.description: We’re offering exclusive bundle deals for founders and investors attending TechCrunch Disrupt 2025. Bring a group of 4 or more and save up to 20%. Thi...

item.title: Composite gets backing from NFDG for its cross-browser agent tool
item.description: The central pitch of AI browsers like Perplexity’s Comet, Opera’s Neon, and The Browser Company’s Dia is that they’ll help you complete daily tasks mo...

item.title: Google's Latest AI Ransomware Defense Only Goes So Far
item.description: Google has launched a new AI-based protection in Drive for desktop that can shut down an attack before it spreads—but its benefits have their limits.

item.title: DoorDash’s New Delivery Robot Rolls Out Into the Big, Cruel World
item.description: The hype around delivery robots has fizzled, but DoorDash is still determined to launch Dot, an adorable red bot. It can ride on roads and in bike lan...

item.title: CommanderAI says it’s building the Salesforce for the waste management industry
item.description: CommanderAI built an AI-driven CRM and sales prospecting platform that continues the nuances of the waste management industry.

item.title: Best Wireless Headphones (2025): Tested Over Many Hours
item.description: From workout-ready earbuds to gaming over-ears, these WIRED-tested picks sound like a million bucks.

item.title: Less than a month until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — do not let competitors steal your exhibit table
item.description: Disrupt is where companies meet their first investors, form game-changing partnerships, and spark the ideas that take them to the next level. Book you...

item.title: Imgur pulls out of UK after data regulator warns of fines
item.description: Imgur, one of the web's most popular image sharing and hosting platforms, has shut off access to its site in the U.K., following a notice of a fine by...
